changeSet.sql: WITH devices_series AS ( SELECT GENERATE_SERIES(1, 10000) AS devices ) INSERT INTO devices(model, status, username, inserted_date_at_utc, device_type_id) SELECT CASE WHEN RANDOM() < 0.3 THEN 'SAMSUNG' WHEN RANDOM() >= 0.3 AND RANDOM() < 0.45 THEN 'HUAWEI' WHEN RANDOM() >= 0.45 AND RANDOM() < 0.85 THEN 'XIAOMI' ELSE 'APPLE' END, CASE WHEN d.devices % 2 = 0 THEN 'IN_USE'::device_status_enum ELSE 'BROKEN'::device_status_enum END, 'User' || d.devices, '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000'::TIMESTAMP + (FLOOR(RANDOM() * 30) + 1)::INTEGER * INTERVAL '7 DAY' + (FLOOR(RANDOM() * 24))::INTEGER * INTERVAL '1 HOUR' + (FLOOR(RANDOM() * 60))::INTEGER * INTERVAL '10 MINUTE' + (FLOOR(RANDOM() * 60))::INTEGER * INTERVAL '18 SECOND', FLOOR(RANDOM() * 6) + 1 FROM devices_series d
